dct_title_s: Map of Connecticut prepared by the U.S. Geological Survey; in cooperation with the State of Connecticut.
dct_description_sm: Contour interval 100 feet. Engraved by George S. Harris & Sons. Wooded areas in green. Issued in 2 sheets. 1 map: col., dissected in 4 pieces and mounted on linen; 107 x 134 cm, folded to 55 x 72 cm
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
